definitions.text: (often followed by `of') a large number or amount or extent
examples: he made a mint on the stock market
see the rest of the winners in our huge passel of photos
The car cut to the left at the intersection
The motorbike veered to the right

definitions.text: move obliquely or sideways, usually in an uncontrolled manner
examples: the wheels skidded against the sidewalk
The mafia boss ordered his enemies murdered
